section.p: Notifications define how users are informed when a threshold value defined for an alarm is reached or exceeded. In the alarm definition, you can assign one or multiple notifications.
For a notification, you specify the following elements:

ul.li: Name. A unique identifier of the notification. The name is offered for selection when defining an alarm.
Type. Email is the notification method supported by . If you want to use WebHook or PagerDuty, contact your support for further information.

Address. The email address to be notified when an alarm is triggered.
Generic top-level domains such as business domain names are not supported in email addresses (for example, user@xyz.company).

section.p: To create, edit, and delete notifications, use Monitoring > Notifications.
